author: tgannon
title: Colombia plane crash: Johan Ramirez who helped ‘pull Chapecoense star from flaming wreckage’ has new home built for family as reward
text:
EFL Touching tribute Colombia plane crash: Johan Ramirez who helped ‘pull Chapecoense star from flaming wreckage’ has new home built for family as reward 
'Angel Boy', 15, and his father have been given a majorly upgraded house for his heroic work in helping save lives By TOBY GANNON
